Reviews.Title: I felt in love!
Reviews.Author: Paula A. Rodriguez "Paula"
Reviews.Content: The lens is just extraordinary. I'm really happy that I bought it.The accessories than came with it are useful and the best is that I don't have to buy them apart.It's a great combo for an amazing lens!

Reviews.Title: 70-300 zoom lens review
Reviews.Author: Daniel B. Wittenstrom
Reviews.Content: Everything came as planned and it works wonderful so far, nice and quite, quick focus, love the 2 step IS. Great product and cannot wait to try it out in horse competitions.

Reviews.Title: it actually was a cannon
Reviews.Author: Jill Thompson
Reviews.Content: everything that I expected. I'm having so much fun with it. I just wish that I knew how to use it with more expertise

Reviews.Title: Excited for a new Canon Lens!
Reviews.Author: Bitapi P. Solomon
Reviews.Content: My package came within 2 weeks of order.  It is a great bundle.  I always care that my lens comes with a UV protective filter.  I am excited to use it.  It is a bit heavy compared to my old Sigma lens but I am hoping the quality far surpasses it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic lens!
Reviews.Author: Irinka
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy with my new lens! It is perfect. I bought it for our safari trip in South Africa. It is not heavy, optimal focal length, now we have a lot of very good pictures from our trip!! And delivery was very fast, thank you a lot!!!

Reviews.Title: The lens are great the accesories are terrible
Reviews.Author: Jose Gonzalez Maya
Reviews.Content: Terrible pack, the lens are great obviously because they are canon, but the accesories are all plastic garbage, even the brush pen came broke. Donpt get this trash with your lens!

Reviews.Title: Trust is mistrusted.............Don't trust this supplier
Reviews.Author: End_User
Reviews.Content: This is awfull when you  buy online, trust is every thing, this guy shipped a refurbished camera by canon dealer which is still disgusting though I placed the order for new one.It is like waste for me. If there was some thing negative stars, I would give it to this supplier.It does not move smoothly, and noisy too..........very bad experience with this supplier though amazon was very helpful on this.

Reviews.Title: Canon 70-300mm lens for use with a Canon EOS 7D camera
Reviews.Author: NK
Reviews.Content: Recently took a cruise in the Caribbean and used the lens alot.  It gave us a great deal of flexibility and took great pictures.An excellent addition to the 18-135mm lens that came with the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Lens includes manufacturer's supplied accessories & warranty , all other accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EF 70-300mm f/4-5.6 IS USM Lens for Canon EOS SLR Cameras
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - CPL (Circular Polarizer) Filter - FL-D (Fluorescent) Filter - Filter Case - Soft Rubber Lens Hood
Pull String Closer Neoprene Soft Lens Pouch with Clip & Belt Loop - High Quality 2 in 1 Lens Cleaning Pen
High Quality Dust Cleaner Blower - Universal Lens Cap Keeper - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EF 70-300mm f/4-5.6 IS USM Telephoto Zoom Lens Digital SLR Cameras + 10pc Bundle Deluxe Accessory Kit
